|ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM5325E; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/02/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = ASUS WL-127n |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2880; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;RT2820; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ASUS" and "DSL-N13 R1.41" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"WL-127n-RW R1.00", "ASUS", and a date code of '''0736''' (September 2007) is silkscreened on the back of the wireless module. There is a '''VIA''' VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board. The default SSID is, according the manual, '''Default''' (yes, there is a captial D). The power adapter shown in the FCC external photos is an '''Amigo''' AMS3-1201200FU (100-240VAC ~ 50/60 Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.2A). ==Links of Interest== [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/dsl-n13 On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=439399 On the DD-WRT forums]
